Reviews.Title: Best camera we've ever had
Reviews.Author: rsd725
Reviews.Content: We have had this camera for about 6 weeks now and it was everything we expected and more. Clear pictures, indise and outside. Great movies. No cons so far. Battery life is good. This replaced a Sony Cybershot camera and we could not be happier with our choice.

ProductInfo.Features:
Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS10 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and Built-In GPS Function (Black) Brand New w/Supplied Manufacturer Accessories
16GB SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card + USB Card Reader
Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod + Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery + Lens/LCD Cleaning Kit
(See description for more details)
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS10 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and Built-In GPS Function (Black) Accessory Saver 16GB Bundle
